veg.title: Veg Crispy_Burger
veg.desc: A veg crispy burger is a delicious and satisfying sandwich made primarily with vegetarian ingredients. It typically consists of a flavorful and crispy vegetable patty served inside a soft burger bun.

veg.title: Classic Veggie Burger
veg.description: A delicious patty made from fresh vegetables and spices, served with lettuce, tomato, and special sauce on a whole wheat bun.

veg.title: Spicy Black Bean Burger
veg.description: A zesty black bean patty with a kick of spices, topped with jalapenos, guacamole, and chipotle mayo on a sesame seed bun.

veg.title: Mushroom Swiss Burger
veg.description: A juicy mushroom and Swiss cheese patty served with caramelized onions, lettuce, and garlic aioli on a brioche bun.

veg.title: BBQ Jackfruit Burger
veg.description: Tender pulled jackfruit in a tangy BBQ sauce, topped with coleslaw and crispy onion straws on a pretzel bun.

non_veg.title: Classic Non Veg Burger
non_veg.description: A mouthwatering beef patty topped with cheddar cheese, crispy bacon, lettuce, tomato, and mayo on a toasted bun.

non_veg.title: Spicy Chicken Burger
non_veg.description: A fiery grilled chicken patty with spicy sauce, jalapenos, pickles, and pepper jack cheese on a sesame seed bun.

non_veg.title: Double Decker Burger
non_veg.description: Two juicy beef patties layered with American cheese, lettuce, tomato, onions, and special sauce on a toasted bun.

non_veg.title: BBQ Pork Burger
non_veg.description: Slow-cooked pulled pork smothered in tangy BBQ sauce, topped with coleslaw and crispy fried onions on a brioche bun.

non_veg.title: Turkey Avocado Burger
non_veg.description: A flavorful turkey patty with avocado slices, Swiss cheese, lettuce, and garlic aioli on a whole wheat bun.

veg.title: Paneer Kathi Roll
veg.description: Grilled paneer tikka wrapped in a soft roti with mint chutney and onions.

veg.title: Aloo Tikki Roll
veg.description: Crispy potato patties with tangy chutneys, rolled in a paratha.

veg.title: Veggie Wrap
veg.description: Assorted vegetables, lettuce, and mayo wrapped in a whole wheat tortilla.

veg.title: Soya Chap Roll
veg.description: Marinated and grilled soya chaap rolled in a paratha with onions and mint chutney.

veg.title: Corn Cheese Roll
veg.description: Creamy corn and cheese filling wrapped in a crispy roll with a tangy sauce.

non_veg.title: Chicken Tikka Roll
non_veg.description: Tender chicken tikka wrapped in a soft roti with mint chutney and onions.

non_veg.title: Egg Roll
non_veg.description: Flavorful scrambled eggs with onions, peppers, and spices, wrapped in a paratha.

non_veg.title: Mutton Keema Roll
non_veg.description: Spicy minced mutton cooked with aromatic spices, rolled in a paratha with onions and mint chutney.

non_veg.title: Fish Curry Roll
non_veg.description: Tangy fish curry wrapped in a soft roti with pickled onions and green chutney.

non_veg.title: Butter Chicken Roll
non_veg.description: Tender chicken cooked in a rich and creamy butter chicken sauce, wrapped in a paratha.

veg.title: Steamed Veg Momos
veg.description: Steamed dumplings filled with a mix of finely chopped vegetables, served with spicy sauce.

veg.title: Fried Veg Momos
veg.description: Crispy fried dumplings stuffed with a vegetable filling, served with sweet chili sauce.

veg.title: Tandoori Veg Momos
veg.description: Marinated and roasted vegetable momos with a smoky flavor, served with mint chutney.

veg.title: Spinach Cheese Momos
veg.description: Steamed dumplings filled with spinach and cheese, served with tangy tomato sauce.

veg.title: Corn Mushroom Momos
veg.description: Delicious dumplings filled with corn and mushroom, served with spicy sesame sauce.

non_veg.title: Chicken Steamed Momos
non_veg.description: Steamed dumplings filled with minced chicken, served with spicy tomato chutney.

non_veg.title: Chicken Fried Momos
non_veg.description: Crispy fried dumplings stuffed with chicken filling, served with tangy soy sauce.

non_veg.title: Mutton Momos
non_veg.description: Delicious dumplings filled with minced mutton, served with spicy sesame sauce.

non_veg.title: Fish Momos
non_veg.description: Steamed dumplings filled with fish and spices, served with spicy garlic sauce.

non_veg.title: Prawn Momos
non_veg.description: Delectable dumplings filled with prawns and herbs, served with tangy chili sauce.

veg.description: Stir-fried noodles with assorted vegetables in a tangy soy-based sauce.

veg.description: Soft noodles tossed with cubes of paneer, vegetables, and aromatic spices

veg.description: Spicy noodles cooked with Schezwan sauce, assorted vegetables, and garlic

veg.title: Veg Thai Noodles
veg.description: A flavorful combination of Thai noodles, vegetables, and exotic spices.

veg.title: Veg Singapore Noodles
veg.description: Vermicelli noodles stir-fried with vegetables, curry powder, and soy sauce

non_veg.description: Tossed noodles with succulent chicken, vegetables, and a flavorful sauce.

veg.title: Cheese Corn Pizza
veg.description: A delectable combination of cheese, sweet corn, and herbs on a cheesy base.

veg.title: Mushroom Quattro Formaggi Pizza
veg.description: Four cheese pizza topped with mushrooms, garlic, and a hint of truffle oil.
